text: Cucumber Raita is a variation of raita that can be used as a dip or a salad. It is made by mixing together freshly chopped cucumber, green chillies, and dahi (yogurt), and optionally finely chopped tomato and onion. It is especially popular in the summer months as it helps to beat the heat.Diets for the Summer, Marje Gosling, 2014 It is often served as a side accompaniment with the main course in Indian cuisine. ==See also== * Raita * List of yogurt- based dishes and beverages ==References== ==External links== * Sanjeev Kapoor's Recipe for Raita * Benefits of Cucumber Raita Category:Vegetarian dishes of India Category:Yogurt-based dishes
